A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is amazing! It may not be the top of the SW pile (Empire is on top) but it's damn great! TLJ gives this new trilogy a new direction and sets up stakes that will have great impact on the future of the series. The acting is amazing\, the characters are fleshed out\, and the action is awesome! Not sure why it is getting so much hate. I feel it's not justified! This film is a great time at the cinema!
